meanings.definition: Of or relating to hymenopterous insects.
meanings.sent1: The tiny hymenopterous wings shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of hymenopterous insects in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned into a comedy show when a group of hymenopterous bees decided to join.
meanings.sent4: Her work ethic was as diligent as a hymenopterous ant tirelessly building its nest.
meanings.sent5: The garden buzzed with the hymenopterous activity of bees collecting nectar.

meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with the buzzing of a hymenopterous searching for flowers.
meanings.sent2: A hymenopterous can be identified by its distinctive body shape.
meanings.sent3: The picnic turned into a comedy show when a curious hymenopterous landed on the cake.
meanings.sent4: She was as busy as a hymenopterous gathering food for the winter.
meanings.sent5: The children watched in awe as the hymenopterous flew gracefully from flower to flower.
